PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-14212005-08-29,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of JEAN-CLAUDE CYR of Montréal, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Thérèse Spénard-Pilon.
AttachmentsAttachment
